thumb.title: chordcatでRoland SC-88vlを鳴らす
thumb.description: chordcatがせっかくMIDIをトラックごとに別chで吐けるので、物理音源を鳴らしてみます0:00 making a song5:17 playing song in chordcat8:17 connecting chordcat to SC-88vl13:13 playing song in SC-88vl by chordcatGears: - chordcat - roland SC-88vlI would like to playing hardware sound generator Roland SC-88vl by chordcat MIDI function.My X (Twitter): https://twitter.com/haori_chiratoinstagram: https://www.instagram.com/haori.chirato/
